TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit SortKey extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the result of mapping a string to its sort key.

span.span: Represents the result of mapping a string to its sort key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 區分文化特性比較兩個字串取決於具有數個類別，排序權數，包括指令碼，是英文字母，字串中的每個字元大小寫和變音符號權數。A culture-sensitive comparison of two strings depends on each character in the strings having several categories of sort weights, including script, alphabetic, case, and diacritic weights. 排序索引鍵做為這些加權的特定字串的儲存機制。A sort key serves as the repository of these weights for a particular string. 方法傳回的執行個體反映指定的字串中的字元的區分文化特性對應的類別。The method returns an instance of the class that reflects the culture-sensitive mapping of characters in a specified string. 值物件是其索引鍵的資料，由屬性。The value of a object is its key data, which is returned by the property. 此索引鍵的資料是由一系列的字串、 特定文化特性的排序規則和使用者指定的比較選項進行編碼的位元組所組成。This key data consists of a series of bytes that encode the string, culture-specific sorting rules, and user-specified comparison options. 使用的排序鍵比較包含對應的索引鍵資料在每個排序索引鍵中的位元比較。A comparison using sort keys consists of a bitwise comparison of the corresponding key data in each sort key. 例如，如果您藉由呼叫建立排序索引鍵方法，其值為，使用的排序鍵的字串比較作業不區分大小寫。For example, if you create a sort key by calling the method with a value of , a string comparison operation that uses the sort key is case-insensitive. 建立字串的排序鍵之後，您藉由呼叫靜態比較排序鍵方法。After you create a sort key for a string, you compare sort keys by calling the static method. 這個方法會執行簡單的逐位元組比較，因此它的速度比或方法。This method performs a simple byte-by-byte comparison, so it is much faster than the or method. ## 效能考量Performance considerations 執行字串比較，當和方法會產生相同的結果，但它們以不同的案例為目標。When performing a string comparison, the and methods yield the same results, but they target different scenarios. 概括而言，方法會產生每個字串的排序鍵、 執行比較，然後捨棄的排序鍵，並傳回比較的結果。At a high level, the method generates the sort key for each string, performs the comparison, and then discards the sort key and returns the result of the comparison. 不過，方法實際上不會產生整個排序索引鍵，以進行比較。However, the method actually doesn't generate an entire sort key to perform the comparison. 相反地，此方法會產生每個字串中的索引鍵的資料，每個文字項目 （也就是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列）。Instead, the method generates the key data for each text element (that is, base character, surrogate pair, or combining character sequence) in each string. 方法接著會比較索引鍵對應的文字項目的資料。The method then compares the key data for the corresponding text elements. 一旦決定比較的最終結果，就會終止作業。The operation terminates as soon as the ultimate result of the comparison is determined. 計算的排序索引鍵資訊，但沒有建立物件。Sort key information is computed, but no object is created. 這項策略時實惠效能方面一次，比較這兩個字串，但會高度耗費資源，如果相同的字串比較的次數。This strategy is economical in terms of performance if both strings are compared once, but becomes expensive if the same strings are compared many times. 方法需要產生針對每個字串，然後再執行比較的物件。The method requires generation of a object for each string before performing the comparison. 此策略會耗用大量效能的第一個比較，因為時間和投資以產生記憶體物件。This strategy is expensive in terms of performance for the first comparison because of the time and memory invested to generate the objects. 不過，它會變成符合經濟效益，如果相同的排序鍵比較的次數。However, it becomes economical if the same sort keys are compared many times. 例如，假設您撰寫的應用程式，搜尋的字串為基礎的索引資料行符合指定的搜尋字串的資料列的資料庫資料表。For example, suppose you write an application that searches a database table for the row in which the string-based index column matches a specified search string. 資料表包含數千個資料列，並且比較每個資料列中的索引的搜尋字串需要很長的時間。The table contains thousands of rows, and comparing the search string to the index in each row will take a long time. 因此，當應用程式儲存的資料列和其索引資料行，它也會產生，並專門用來提升搜尋效能資料行中儲存索引的排序索引鍵。Therefore, when the application stores a row and its index column, it also generates and stores the sort key for the index in a column dedicated to improving search performance. 當應用程式搜尋目標資料列時，它會比較的索引字串，而不是比較索引字串的搜尋字串的排序索引鍵的搜尋字串的排序索引鍵。When the application searches for a target row, it compares the sort key for the search string to the sort key for the index string, instead of comparing the search string to the index string. ## 安全性考量Security considerations 方法會傳回物件的值，根據指定的字串與值，以及與基礎相關聯的文化特性物件。The method returns a object with the value based on a specified string and value, and the culture associated with the underlying object. 如果安全性決策是根據字串比較或大小寫變更而定，您應該使用方法而異的文化特性，以確保作業的行為一致，不論作業系統的文化特性設定為何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or case change, you should use the method of the invariant culture to ensure that the behavior of the operation is consistent, regardless of the culture settings of the operating system. 您可以使用下列步驟來取得排序索引鍵：Use the following steps to obtain a sort key: 1. 擷取的文化特性而異屬性。Retrieve the invariant culture from the property. 2. 擷取而異的文化特性，從物件屬性。Retrieve a object for the invariant culture from the property. 3. 呼叫 方法。Call the method. 使用的值物件是否相當於呼叫 Windows `LCMapString` LCMAP_SORTKEY 值的指定方法。Working with the value of a object is equivalent to calling the Windows `LCMapString` method with the LCMAP_SORTKEY value specified. 不過，對於物件中，使用英文字元的排序索引鍵前面韓文字元的排序索引鍵。However, for the object, the sort keys for English characters precede the sort keys for Korean characters. 物件可以序列化，但只限於，讓它們可以跨物件。 objects can be serialized, but only so that they can cross objects. 如果應用程式序列化物件時，應用程式必須重新產生所有排序索引鍵，新的.NET framework 版本時。If an application serializes a object, the application must regenerate all the sort keys when there is a new version of the .NET Framework. 多個排序鍵的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode 技術標準 #10，"Unicode 定序演算法 」，在[Unicode 協會網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about sort keys, see Unicode Technical Standard #10, "Unicode Collation Algorithm" on the [Unicode Consortium website](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下列範例會比較使用"EN-US"和"ES-ES"文化特性，以及"EN-US"和"ES-ES"傳統的文化特性字串"駱馬"。The following example compares the string "llama" using the "en-US" and "es-ES" cultures, and the "en-US" and "es-ES" traditional cultures. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.SortKey.Compare#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.SortKey.Compare/CPP/sortkey_compare.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.SortKey.Compare#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.SortKey.Compare/CS/sortkey_compare.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.SortKey.Compare#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.SortKey.Compare/VB/sortkey_compare.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用類別來改善大量依賴排序和搜尋大型陣列的應用程式中的效能。The following example shows how you can use the class to improve performance in an application that relies extensively on sorting and searching a large array. 此範例會建立未排序的陣列名稱，在此情況下有 13 個元素。The example creates an unordered array of names, which in this case has 13 elements. 接著會每個名稱的排序索引鍵儲存在平行陣列中，這會傳遞給方法。It then stores the sort key of each name in a parallel array, which it passes to the method. 結果是已排序的陣列。The result is a sorted array. 此範例接著會搜尋三個字串的陣列。The example then searches the array for three strings. 每個搜尋字串，它會呼叫方法來擷取字串的排序索引鍵，然後再呼叫方法來擷取該陣列中的排序索引鍵的排序索引鍵的索引。For each search string, it calls the method to retrieve the string's sort key, and then calls the method to retrieve the index of that sort key in the array of sort keys. 名稱和排序的索引鍵陣列是平行的因為傳回的索引也是您的索引中的名稱`names`陣列。Because the name and sort key arrays are parallel, the returned index is also the index of the name in the `names` array. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.SortKey.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.sortkey.class/cs/sortkey1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.SortKey.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.sortkey.class/vb/sortkey1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會比較的屬性`sortkey1`和`sortkey2`參數。The method compares the properties of the `sortkey1` and `sortkey2` parameters. 方法會產生相同的結果為方法。The method yields the same results as the method. 如需詳細資訊方法，並比較的排序鍵，請參閱類別主題。For more information about the method and the comparison of sort keys, see the class topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較使用兩個字串方法，並對等項目方法。The following code example compares two strings using the method and the equivalent method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是"SortKey-"的字串串連、 文化特性識別項和比較選項的目前物件和值屬性。The return value is the concatenation of the string "SortKey - ", the culture identifier and compare options of the current object, and the value of the property. 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示原始的字串，所產生的字串區分大小寫和區分大小寫的排序鍵，和區分大小寫和區分大小寫的排序索引鍵的按鍵資料的方法。The following code example displays an original string, the strings yielded by the method for case-sensitive and case-insensitive sort keys, and the key data for case-sensitive and case-insensitive sort keys.
